text: Regarding the description: Yukihiro Jindo only arranged this track - and Ishikawa had nothing to do with it, the song was actually done by Yuzo Koshiro.

author: animefanatic777

text: Omg!!! I am so glad you finally put this up! What took so long! I remember beating this game finally on the difficulty below the hardest one the first time. That last fight I spent 4 hours trying to beat. Soooooooo worth with this music playing though (and not realizing you had to switch weapons probably made that fight longer lol...). Such a badass theme.

text: I lost count of the number of times I heard this theme's intro before getting my butt kicked by Dark Fact. I eventually beat him with luck and sweaty palms. I'm really hoping for a Ys VII and VIII Steam release (and Celceta!), I like having this series available in my Steam library.
author: SupraDarky

text: Supra, do you set back a bunch of songs to upload, or do you pick one each day?
author: Krusty Kraken

text: A mix of both. I have a set of VGMs I know I will eventually upload, but most of the time I like to upload music I chose only a couple minutes before I put it on YT, or that I've been listening to a lot in the past couple days. It's more fun that way.
author: SupraDarky

text:
Can I recommend you go listen to Mana Khemia songs again?

Been replaying the Mana Khemia on Ps2 and noticed a ton of good(And weird music too somehow?!) that I didn't hear until I decided to take in everything of the game.

I already know you have Nefertiti on your VGM list(Which is the reason I got Mana KHemia itself also!) but who knows, maybe a song makes you nostalgic? :)
author: Vordox
